description: ff. 253. 306 x 210; 250 x 173 mm. 33 lin. Mashhad, Dhū al-Qaʻdah 885, Zayn al-ʻĀbidīn ibn ʻAlī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Baḥr. Acephalous- on fol. la lin. 7 begins the commentary on ʻAlī ʼs words لم تکن بىعتکم اىاى فلتة (Nahj al-balāghah, ed. ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz Sayyid al-Ahl, Beirut, 1374/1954, v. 2, p. 88): ... اقول الفلتة امر ىقع من غىر تدبر ولا روىة
author: Baḥrānī, Maytham ibn ʻAlī, -1280?
title: Sharḥ Nahj al-balāghah
creator: Baḥrānī, Maytham ibn ʻAlī, -1280?
subject: Sharīf al-Raḍī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥusayn, 969 or 70-1016—Nahj al-balāghah
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
